short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension for visualizing Marmoset test results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- Test overviews for Marmoset instructor view
- Timer for homepage dashboard auto-refresh
- Freeze table headers
- Display various stats in diagrams
- Coloured table cells for better views
- Quick link to neighbour projects
- Auto-refresh for untested submissions
- Configuration for chart display


Github repository: https://github.com/k47ma/marmostats-chrome
